caption:
“Kneel. Breathe. Endure.”

Reflection:
Simplicity becomes sanctity. To kneel is to yield, to breathe is to believe, to endure is to love.

Commentary:
This quote distills the monastic path: humility, presence, and perseverance. In these, the soul finds its strength.
